Posts.Content: A good resource to help find help with finances and other information pertaining to cancer is www.patientresource.net.  Patient Resource puts out a magazine that has several pages of places to contact for financial help.    I pray that God gives you and your family the strength needed to get through this difficult time. kzfamily
Posts.Title: Financial Assistance I NEED HELP!!!

Posts.Content: Go to www.patientresource.net.  They have cancer patient resource information.  Good Luck kzfamily
Posts.Title: how to i find financial help
